articles.author: Fiona Jackson
articles.title: Shaun the Sheep will be the first 'astronaut' to fly on the Artemis I mission around the moon - Daily Mail
articles.description: The European Space Agency has announced that the first astronaut to blast off onboard the Artemis I mission to the moon will be Shaun the Sheep.
articles.content:
The identity of the first astronaut to blast off onboard the Artemis I mission to the moon has been revealed - and it is none other than Shaun the Sheep.
A figurine of Aardman's beloved character wi… [+7664 chars]
